Nice game, really fun but the only problem is that when you start playing your will absolutely DESTROYED for a long time until you get better.

Csgo is so fixated on its basic fundamentals in its approach and commitment to hardcore players it’s easy to see why this game to this day is still a huge success in gaming and esports. it’s rewarding on a basic level without the vanity items and season pass progression. After coming back after a long hiatus it’s easy to understand short comings and adapt no overly complicated abilities to wrap your head like siege or fast as hell gameplay like most FPS games today, Csgo is light on its feet but emphasises accuracy above all. A legendary game.

Devil of a game... 
From gambling, to the “accurate shots”.
And the rage and toxicity, it is diabolical.

Worst game ever. Would never reccomend to anyone that is willing to keep their sanity. Please do not download. Unfun game because you start in silver and it takes no joke 1000+ hours to just leaver silver 4. There is no clear ranking system and it seems like its all just luck. When you're trying to rank up there are only smurfs that go 30-1 and you can't play anything fun. Youre forced to buy AWPS for people that die with them every fucking round and they flame when u buy deagle only. ????? What type of game doesnt let you go off meta and win. -1/10 save yourself
